article_title: In ‘Baskets,’ Zach Galifianakis Plays a Clown
article_text:
Seven years ago, Zach Galifianakis was working his patch of the alternative comedy field, telling absurd jokes in small clubs, noodling on a piano, mouthing the lyrics to “Tomorrow” in a Little Orphan Annie costume and mocking his “fat Jesus” look.

Then the movie “The Hangover” hit, making Mr. Galifianakis famous for his role as a man-child prone to inappropriate one-liners. That led to two sequels for Mr. Galifianakis and other...

twitter.description: Funnyman Zach Galifianakis, who made his name with “The Hangover” movies and the web series “Between Two Ferns,” plays an embittered clown in the new FX series “Baskets.”
twitter.title: In ‘Baskets,’ Zach Galifianakis Plays a Clown
